mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO stoneblock
CODE, S_DT, SOURCE, PLACE, C_DT, U_DT, NUMBER, LENGTH, WIDTH, HEIGHT, CUBE, PRICE, SUM, PLATENUMBER, ACCOUNTDIFF, AUDITOR, EDITOR, COMMENT, STATE, BLOCKNUMBER, C_ID,
#{code}, #{s_dt}, #{source}, #{place}, #{c_dt}, #{u_dt}, #{number}, #{length}, #{width}, #{height}, #{cube}, #{price}, #{sum}, #{platenumber}, #{accountdiff}, #{auditor}, #{editor}, #{comment}, #{state}, #{blocknumber}, #{c_id},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
